# BigCommerce WordPress GraphQL Example Class

Showcases how to access product data on BigCommerce with a GraphQL request.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/)  
**Requires at least:** 5.5  
**Tested up to:** 5.5  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

Showcases how to access product data on BigCommerce with a GraphQL request.

## Installation ##

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1. Upload the `bc-graphql-example` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
1. Create new or Edit a Post.

## Usage ##

Put the shortcode `[render_graphql_data]` on a page to see product data.

Peruse the code to see how it works.
